amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, $10,000,000 for Project Sheriff.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2497 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2497 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12593) To make available, with an offset, $10,000,000 for Project Sheriff.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2497 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2497 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Kerry.
